name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Skilled Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in creating robust backend solutions, proficient in **Node.js**, **GraphQL**, and **PostgreSQL**. Strong emphasis on Test-Driven Development (TDD) to ensure high-quality code. Extensive use of **AWS** for cloud infrastructure, adept in core database concepts to optimize performance and scalability. Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving capabilities while contributing to significant projects at industry-leading companies. Expertise in designing scalable systems and automation tools, specializing in financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines leveraging **Python** frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**.
